messages.content:
I'm a recent graduate and I'm looking for software engineering jobs in Hyderabad, but I'm scared because of the current layoffs in the industry.  

Give me the latest news related to IT layoffs in India. List out software engineering job openings in Hyderabad.

reasoning: To address the first part of the user's request, I will search for the latest news related to IT layoffs in India to provide up-to-date information.

messages.name: google_news

    "JobResult(title='Principal software Engineer full stack -R3', company_name='Lilly', location='Hyderabad, Telangana, India', via='Lilly Careers - Eli Lilly', description='At Lilly, we unite caring with discovery to make life better for people around the world. We are a global healthcare leader headquartered in Indianapolis, Indiana. Our employees around the world work to discover and bring life-changing medicines to those who need them, improve the understanding and management of disease, and give back to our communities through philanthropy and volunteerism. We give our best effort to our work, and we put people first. We\u2019re looking for people who are determined to make life better for people around the world.\\n\\nPrincipal Software Engineering\\n\\nJob Family: Software Engineering\\n\\nTime Type: Full time\\n\\nJob Type: Regular\\n\\nLevel: R3\\n\\nPost: Internal & External\\n\\nCome build the next generation of Software Engineering, so we can reach and support more patients digitally!\\n\\nLilly\u2019s mission is to develop and maintain software products that meet the needs and requirements of both our internal and external customers. This typically involves a combination of activities such as gathering and analyzing user requirements, designing, and implementing software solutions, testing and debugging code, and maintaining and improving the performance and reliability of the software over time. The goal of software engineering at Lilly is to create high-quality, reliable, and effective software utilizing cutting edge methodologies and integrations to solve Lilly\u2019s real-world problems and provide value to our customers.\\n\\nWhat You\u2019ll Be Doing\\n\u2022 Develop and contribute to frontend and backend frameworks supporting business-critical applications.\\n\u2022 Design and build scalable, reusable, and maintainable backend services and APIs.\\n\u2022 Replace commercial off-the-shelf (COTS) systems with modern, in-house scalable solutions.\\n\u2022 Develop user-facing interfaces using React.js, Angular, or Vue.js with a focus on performance and accessibility.\\n\u2022 Coach and mentor junior engineers and help raise the overall technical bar.\\n\u2022 Help define and maintain engineering standards, including CI/CD and code quality practices.\\n\u2022 Collaborate across teams to deliver impactful features with measurable value.\\n\\nKey Responsibilities\\n\\nBackend Development\\n\u2022 Experience with backend programming in Java/Python, and Node.js(backend frameworks like Express JS, Hapi JS etc.)\\n\u2022 Design and implement robust APIs (RESTful or GraphQL) and microservices using Node.js and frameworks like Express.js or Koa.js.\\n\u2022 Build and manage scalable backend services with fault-tolerance, performance, and security in mind.\\n\u2022 Integrate with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and manage infrastructure with CI/CD tools like GitHub Actions or Jenkins.\\n\u2022 Work with databases such as MongoDB and PostgreSQL to store and retrieve structured and unstructured data efficiently.\\n\\nFrontend Development\\n\u2022 Build responsive and accessible UIs using React.js, Angular, or Vue.js.\\n\u2022 Implement modern UI development practices, including component-based design and state management (e.g., Redux).\\n\u2022 Collaborate with designers and UX teams to implement pixel-perfect interfaces using Material UI, Ant Design, or similar systems.\\n\u2022 Optimize front-end applications for performance and Core Web Vitals.\\n\u2022 Knowledge of accessibility best practices and WCAG 2.2 standards.\\n\u2022 Hands-on experience building responsive, cross-browser compatible applications.\\n\\nRequired Skills\\n\u2022 Strong proficiency in one or more frontend frameworks: React.js, Angular, or Vue.js.\\n\u2022 Solid understanding of JavaScript (ES6+), TypeScript, HTML5, and CSS3.\\n\u2022 Proficient in backend development with Node.js and frameworks such as Express.js or Koa.js.\\n\u2022 Experience with RESTful and GraphQL APIs, microservices architecture, and real-time communication (e.g., WebSockets).\\n\u2022 Practical experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, or GCP).\\n\u2022 Familiar with state management tools (e.g., Redux, Context API).\\n\u2022 Strong testing experience using tools like Jest, React Testing Library, Cypress, or Playwright.\\n\u2022 Comfortable with frontend build tools like Webpack, Vite, Babel, and linters like ESLint.\\n\u2022 Experience working with CI/CD pipelines, source control (Git), and modern DevOps workflows.\\n\\nPreferred Qualifications\\n\u2022 Familiarity with Core Web Vitals and frontend performance optimization techniques.\\n\u2022 Experience with component-driven development using a design system (e.g., Material UI, Ant Design).\\n\u2022 Exposure to domain-driven design (DDD), serverless architecture, or event-driven systems.\\n\u2022 Contributions to open-source projects or experience leading technical discussions and architecture reviews.\\n\\nAI-Enhanced Development\\n\u2022 Leverage AI tools like GitHub Copilot to accelerate development workflows, improve code quality, and reduce boilerplate.\\n\u2022 Demonstrate proficiency in prompt engineering to effectively guide AI tools in generating optimal and context-aware code solutions.\\n\u2022 Use AI-assisted pair programming to support rapid prototyping, test case generation, and debugging.\\n\u2022 Stay informed about the evolving landscape of AI-powered development tools and integrate best practices into day-to-day engineering work.\\n\u2022 Encourage and mentor team members on responsible and secure use of AI in the software development lifecycle.\\n\\nSoft Skills\\n\u2022 Effective verbal and written communication skills\\n\u2022 Ability to work collaboratively across backend, frontend, DevOps, and product teams\\n\u2022 A high degree of intellectual curiosity and commitment to continuous learning\\n\\nBasic Qualifications\\n\u2022 Bachelor\u2019s degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related technical field.\\n\u2022 8+ years of hands-on software development experience across frontend and backend systems.\\n\u2022 Demonstrated ability to lead code reviews, guide junior engineers, and build production-grade software.\\n\u2022 Strong foundation in computer science fundamentals, software architecture, and cloud-native patterns.\\n\\nAbout the Organization\\n\\nTech@Lilly builds and maintains capabilities using pioneering technologies like most prominent tech companies. What differentiates Tech@Lilly is that we create new possibilities through tech to advance our purpose \u2013 creating medicines that make life better for people around the world, like data driven drug discovery and connected clinical trials. We hire the best technology professionals from a variety of backgrounds, so they can bring an assortment of knowledge, skills, and diverse thinking to deliver solutions in every area of our business.\\n\\nLilly is dedicated to helping individuals with disabilities to actively engage in the workforce, ensuring equal opportunities when vying for positions. If you require accommodation to submit a resume for a position at Lilly, please complete the accommodation request form (https://careers.lilly.com/us/en/workplace-accommodation) for further assistance. Please note this is for individuals to request an accommodation as part of the application process and any other correspondence will not receive a response.\\n\\nLilly does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, gender expression, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.\\n\\n#WeAreLilly', job_highlights=[], apply_options=[{'title': 'Lilly Careers -     "JobResult(title='Staff Software Engineer Fullstack/UI', company_name='ServiceNow', location='Hyderabad, Telangana, India', via='ServiceNow Careers', description=\"Company Description\\n\\nIt all started in sunny San Diego, California in 2004 when a visionary engineer, Fred Luddy, saw the potential to transform how we work. This may include using AI-powered tools, automating workflows, analyzing AI-driven insights, or exploring AI's potential impact on the function or industry.\\n\u2022 9+ years of experience with Java or a similar OO language\\n\u2022 Passion for JavaScript and the Web as a platform, reusability, and componentization\\n\u2022 Experience with data structures, algorithms, object-oriented design, design patterns, and performance/scale considerations\\n\u2022 Experience with any of the modern UI frameworks like Angular, React or Vue\\n\u2022 Analytical and design skills\\n\u2022 Ability to manage projects with material technical risk at a team level\\n\u2022 Experience in using Al productivity tools such as Cursor, Windsurf, etc. is a plus or nice to have.\\n\\nWJAISNJOBS\\n\\nFD21\\nAdditional Information\\n\\nWork Personas\\n\\nWe approach our distributed world of work with flexibility and trust. messages.content:
Here is an update on the latest IT layoffs in India and a list of software engineering job openings in Hyderabad:

LATEST NEWS ON IT LAYOFFS IN INDIA (October 2025):
- Mass layoffs and restructuring continue in the Indian IT sector. Notable companies like TCS, Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Oracle, Accenture, and Salesforce have cut thousands of jobs in recent months, with AI automation and global market pressures being frequently cited factors.
- TCS alone has confirmed nearly 20,000 job cuts in its 'biggest ever layoff', with some reports and labor unions suggesting even higher numbers. (https://www.indiatoday.in/technology/news/story/tcs-cuts-nearly-20000-jobs-its-biggest-layoff-ever-story-in-5-points-2801402-2025-10-11)
- Amazon has announced plans to lay off up to 15% of its HR staff and more globally. (https://www.indiatoday.in/technology/news/story/amazon-plans-major-layoffs-up-to-15-per-cent-of-hr-staff-and-more-could-be-fired-2803305-2025-10-15)
- 'Silent layoffs'where staff are let go without formal announcementsare reportedly rising among Indian tech companies. (https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/education/careers/news/silent-layoffs-on-the-rise-in-indian-tech-sector-subtle-signs-employees-should-watch-out-for/articleshow/124498098.cms)
- Other major headlines note that over 80,000 technology jobs have been lost in India in 2025, affecting both established firms and startups. (https://www.indiatoday.in/education-today/news/story/over-80000-tech-jobs-lost-in-2025-microsoft-intel-meta-lead-layoff-wave-2773359-2025-08-19)
- However, some companies like Infosys have publicly stated they are not planning layoffs and are focusing on hiring freshers and reskilling for AI roles. (https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/business/india-business/tcs-layoffs-rattle-it-sector-infosys-rules-out-job-cuts-focuses-on-freshers-and-ai-reskilling/articleshow/122982813.cms)

SOFTWARE ENGINEERING JOB OPENINGS IN HYDERABAD (OCT 2025):
Despite layoffs, there are significant openings for software engineers in Hyderabad, though many require experience:

1. Principal Software Engineer Full Stack - Lilly
- Tech stack: Frontend (React.js/Angular/Vue.js), Backend (Node.js/Java/Python), Cloud (AWS/Azure/GCP).
- 8+ years experience required.
- [Apply here](https://careers.lilly.com/us/en/job/R-88083/Principal-software-Engineer-full-stack-R3?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

2. Staff Software Engineer Fullstack/UI - ServiceNow
- Java, JavaScript, modern UI frameworks (Angular/React/Vue), experience with AI tools a plus.
- 9+ years experience required.
- [Apply here](https://careers.servicenow.com/jobs/744000087846729/staff-software-engineer-fullstackui/?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

3. Full-Stack Software Engineer MTS [PHP Developer Only] - Salesforce
- Wordpress, PHP, JavaScript, ReactJS/AngularJs, NodeJS/Express/TypeScript.
- 4+ years experience required.
- [Apply here](https://careers.salesforce.com/en/jobs/jr282340/full-stack-software-engineer-mts-php-developer-only-hyderabad/?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

4. Senior (Sr.) Software Engineer - Java FS, Node Js, Angular - Open Text Technologies
- Python, Node.js, Java, Angular, RDBMS, AWS
- 5+ years experience required.
- [Apply here](https://careers.opentext.com/us/en/job/48822/Sr-Software-Engineer-Java-FS-Node-Js-Angular?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

5. Software Engineer, Senior Associate - State Street
- Java, C#, SQL, JavaScript, SpringBoot, Microservices, Cloud (Azure)
- 7+ years experience required.
- [Apply here](https://careers.statestreet.com/global/en/job/STSTGLOBALR778972EXTERNALENGLOBAL/Software-Engineer-Senior-Associate?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

6. Sr./Staff Software Engineer - GE Vernova
- Power Systems, strong technical software development, team leadership
- 12+ years experience, power systems domain
- [Apply here](https://careers.gevernova.com/global/en/job/GVXGVWGLOBALR5021684EXTERNALENGLOBAL/Sr-Staff-Software-Engineer?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

7. Lead Software Engineer (Java/Flink/Cloud) - Wells Fargo
- Java frameworks, Flink, Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure), ETL, Data Engineering
- 5-12+ years experience
- [Apply here](https://www.wellsfargojobs.com/fr/jobs/r-498983/lead-software-engineer-flink-java-cloud/?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

8. Lead Software Engineer (.NET/C#) - FACTSET
- .NET, C#, MVC, WebAPI, Office Interop, Azure/AWS
- 8-10 years experience, 2+ years team lead/management
- [Apply here](https://www.efinancialcareers.com/jobs-India-Hyderabad-Lead_Software_Engineer-_Dotnet_Developer-_IBS_Engineering.id23315242?utm_campaign=google_jobs_apply&utm_source=google_jobs_apply&utm_medium=organic)

Advice: The majority of current openings appear to target candidates with several years of experience. As a recent graduate, consider applying for junior roles, graduate trainee programs, or internships at these or related companiesyou can also look for openings titled "Associate Software Engineer," "Graduate Engineer Trainee," or similar. Upskilling in AI, cloud, and modern frameworks could make you more competitive given current hiring trends.

If you'd like help crafting your application, advice on upskilling, or to search for more entry-level opportunities in Hyderabad or remote roles, let me know!
Ohh. Most Software engineering jobs require the Java programming language. Can you suggest some YouTube videos to learn Java? Also, give me some tips to learn Java fast.

messages.content:
Here are some excellent YouTube resources to start learning Java, along with tips to help you learn Java faster:

Recommended YouTube Videos to Learn Java:
1. Java Full Course for Beginners  Programming with Mosh: https://youtu.be/eIrMbAQSU34 (2h 30m)
2. Learn Java in 14 Minutes (seriously)  Alex Lee: https://youtu.be/RRubcjpTkks (14m)
3. Learn Java in 15 Minutes  ForrestKnight: https://youtu.be/b5l5UodFzMo (20m)
4. Java Tutorial for Complete Beginners  Duckademy IT courses: https://youtu.be/JPOzWljLYuU (1h 02m)
5. Java Full Course for Free (2025)  Bro Code: https://youtu.be/xTtL8E4LzTQ (12h, full comprehensive course)
6. Java Programming for Beginners  Full Course  freeCodeCamp: https://youtu.be/A74TOX803D0 (4h 11m)

Tips to Learn Java Fast:
1. Focus on the Basics First:
   - Understand variables, data types, operators, loops, control structures, and functions/methods.
   - Don't rush through thesestrong basics help you learn advanced topics faster.
2. Practice Coding Regularly:
   - Solve coding exercises on platforms like LeetCode, HackerRank, or CodeSignal.
   - Try to re-implement examples from the videos by yourself.
3. Build Small Projects Early:
   - Make simple programs (calculator, todo list, number guessing game, etc.).
   - Gradually move to more complex mini-projects.
4. Make Use of the Java Documentation:
   - Get comfortable searching and reading the official Java docs (docs.oracle.com) to understand classes and methods.
5. Join Coding Communities:
   - Engage in forums (like Stack Overflow, Reddit r/learnjava), or WhatsApp/Discord groups for help.
6. Debug Your Code:
   - Use an IDE (like IntelliJ IDEA or Eclipse) to write and debug codelearn how to read errors and fix them.
7. Study Object-Oriented Programming (OOP):
   - Java is all about OOP (classes, objects, inheritance, polymorphism, encapsulation, abstraction). Try to model simple scenarios using classes.
8. Apply What You Learn:
   - After each topic, make a small app or tool using that topic (e.g., after learning arrays, build a grade calculator).
9. Learn from Others:
   - Read open-source Java code (e.g., from GitHub), and observe coding styles and best practices.
10. Consistency is Key:
   - A little progress every day is more effective than trying to learn everything at once.

Bonus:
- If you ever get stuck or need more guidance, feel free to ask for clarification or specific Java concepts.
- Once you have basic Java skills, try to complete a real-world mini project and mention it in your resumeit makes you more attractive to employers.

All the best for your Java learning journey! These resources and tips will help you become job-ready as fast as possible.
